title: Spooky Castle Watchface
summary: A spooky halloween castle themed watch face for android wear devices.
developerAddress:
Beulah Cottage
Upper Street
Shere
Guildford
GU5 9JE
description: Lightening strikes a haunted castle that glowers against the growing gloom of dusk. Monsters and apparitions appear. The time is drawn in letters of slime. More fun than it sounds!Features:Supernatural cartoon monstersLightening strikesSlimy green or red digitsTouch to advance to next monster (supported from version 2)Moon follows the real moon phase (as viewed from western Europe)Low battery indicated by a sickly orange glow from the upper window of the left towerVery low battery indicated by a red glow from the same windowCompanion phone app enables you to choose sky and time coloursWear 2.0 versions support on-watch configuration and Wear 2.0 Complications (display data from other applications and app shortcuts)
descriptionHTML:
Lightening strikes a haunted castle that glowers against the growing gloom of dusk. Monsters and apparitions appear. The time is drawn in letters of slime. More fun than it sounds!

Features:
Supernatural cartoon monsters
Lightening strikes
Slimy green or red digits
Touch to advance to next monster (supported from version 2)
Moon follows the real moon phase (as viewed from western Europe)
Low battery indicated by a sickly orange glow from the upper window of the left tower
Very low battery indicated by a red glow from the same window
Companion phone app enables you to choose sky and time colours
Wear 2.0 versions support on-watch configuration and Wear 2.0 Complications (display data from other applications and app shortcuts)
comments: This complication is great!  But it doesn't get five stars because you can't change the 12/24 format.
Pretty cool A nice, "spooky" watch face.  Just what I was looking for.
Awesome Love the different pictures when you tap the face.
recentChanges: - All settings are now configurable on the watch (version 4.0 onward)
- Android Wear 2.0 "Complications" are now supported.  Data from other watch applications, or application shortcuts can be added to the left and right of the watch face.
